description: A Model Context Protocol (MCP) server for Uptime Kuma version 2.

UPTIME_KUMA_URL.description: The URL of your Uptime Kuma instance

UPTIME_KUMA_USERNAME.description: Your Uptime Kuma username (not required if using JWT token authentication or if authentication is disabled)

UPTIME_KUMA_PASSWORD.description: Your Uptime Kuma password (not required if using JWT token authentication or if authentication is disabled)

UPTIME_KUMA_2FA_TOKEN.description: Your 2FA token (only required if two-factor authentication is enabled on your account)

UPTIME_KUMA_JWT_TOKEN.description: Your JWT token for authentication (takes precedence over username/password if provided)
